name: qa-automation-tool
description: Aggressive autonomous QA and security testing agent for recruitment SaaS

scripts.report: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const {exec}=require('child_process');const d=new Date().toISOString().slice(0,10);const p=path.join('reports',d,'report.html');if(!fs.existsSync(p)){console.error('Report not found:',p);process.exit(1);}const cmd=process.platform==='win32'?`start \"\" \"${p}\"`:process.platform==='darwin'?`open \"${p}\"`:`xdg-open \"${p}\"`;exec(cmd);"
